b9eaa4bd-ec6a-4444-a244-3b0e4926e74d.description: Earners of the MSUS Cloud Skills Challenge Champion badge have demonstrated foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.
b9eaa4bd-ec6a-4444-a244-3b0e4926e74d.name: MSUS Cloud Skills Challenge Champion

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed a MSUS Cloud Skills Challenge leveraging Microsoft Learn.

d76effc5-f712-4ce8-bcd5-d192d4ea46b6.description: Earners of the Global AI Bootcamp Participant badge have participated in a community bootcamp to learn about latest news and developments with Artificial Intelligence, as well as take part in AI labs & workshops.
d76effc5-f712-4ce8-bcd5-d192d4ea46b6.name: Global AI Bootcamp Participant

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Must have attended a Global AI Bootcamp event.

6212774c-98ff-4276-be51-59df15c4ec8f.description: Earners of the 5G Modern Connected Apps Cloud Skills Challenge badge have demonstrated foundational level knowledge of 5G technology capabilities, IoT edge, cloud-native apps, Kubernetes, and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a participant in the 5G Modern Connected Apps Cloud Skills Challenge
Must complete all Microsoft Learn modules as part of the 5G Modern Connected Apps learning path

faa1c42a-5fb4-43b6-8247-f82adb065b33.description: Earners of the Global AI Bootcamp Organizers badge have run or been involved in the organization of a local or digital event bootcamp. Bringing together AI enthusiasts to enjoy keynote presentations, workshops and labs as a community.
faa1c42a-5fb4-43b6-8247-f82adb065b33.name: Global AI Bootcamp Organizer

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Must have run or been part of the organization of a Global AI Bootcamp event.

fb4c7c44-d181-445c-b407-a4649b27a8bc.description: Earners of the DevOps Dojo Coach badge have delivered master classes of DevOps Dojo Experiential Learning to internal and external Microsoft customers. By combining presentation, storytelling, discussion, debate, hands-on technical labs and team challenge, the coaches enable participants to learn from experts, learn from peers, learn from doing, learn from playing, learn from pairing, learn from teaching, and learn from unlearn and relearn. In each master class, the coaches help participants.
fb4c7c44-d181-445c-b407-a4649b27a8bc.name: DevOps Dojo Experiential Learning

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Must have coached and completed the DevOps Dojo Experiential Learning.

c954cd2d-45eb-46d1-8987-346b71288440.description: Earners of the Azure Trailblazer Academy badge have completed a self-paced skilling program over three weeks, then have gone on to demonstrate the required skills participating in hackathons and workshops, to deploy solutions. Skills including implementing Enterprise-Scale Analytics, Azure SQL Solutions, modernizing Azure Infrastructure Solutions or many others.
c954cd2d-45eb-46d1-8987-346b71288440.name: Azure Trailblazer Academy

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Must be part of and completed the Azure Trailblazer Academy.
Identify and complete design for a business case (cloud migration, Analytics, Infrastructure Modernization, Azure SQL).

c14c4920-eb83-4959-a225-62822f700d38.description: Earners of the "Microsoft Azure Immersion Workshop: Synapse Analytics" badge have worked side-by-side with Microsoft Cloud Solution Architects implementing hands-on solutions across a wide breath of Azure technologies, including Azure Synapse Serverless SQL Pool, Spark, Pipelines, Dedicated SQL Pools, Lake Databases/Database templates, Log and telemetry analytics, Data governance with Azure Purview, Power BI integration and Data Science with Spark.
c14c4920-eb83-4959-a225-62822f700d38.name: Azure Synapse Workshop - Completion

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Must have participated and completed the Microsoft Azure Immersion Workshop: Synapse Analytics

6bec8621-d213-4430-a104-fc67ada605a1.description: Earners of the "Microsoft Azure Immersion Workshop: Synapse Analytics" Coach badge have instructed participants implementing hands-on solutions across a wide breath of Azure technologies, including Azure Synapse Serverless SQL Pool, Spark, Pipelines, Dedicated SQL Pools, Lake Databases/Database templates, Log and telemetry analytics, Data governance with Azure Purview, Power BI integration and Data Science with Spark.
6bec8621-d213-4430-a104-fc67ada605a1.name: Azure Synapse Workshop - Coach

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Must have instructed participants and help complete the Microsoft Azure Immersion Workshop: Synapse Analytics

8627c4f2-19b2-4419-9f82-34931ffc278f.description: Earners of the What the Hack: Covid-19 response Hack badge participated in a hackathon to develop and implement a data warehousing solution on Microsoft Azure leveraging technologies like Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Data Lake and Databricks. They demonstrated the required skills to deploy similar solutions in their own environments.
8627c4f2-19b2-4419-9f82-34931ffc278f.name: What the Hack: COVID-19 Response

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Must be part of the What the Hack program.
Successfully completed all required challenges.

72616772-6c22-406c-a4c4-8e7f56a90e71.description: Earners of the Microsoft Azure ML Ops Workshop have worked side by side with Microsoft Cloud Solution Architects building and automating Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) in Azure, including Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) with the new Azure Machine Learning and GitHub Actions.
72616772-6c22-406c-a4c4-8e7f56a90e71.name: Azure MLOps Workshop - Completion

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

844bba8c-f5d0-41ac-b67a-21d0f0f96859.description: Earners of the What the Hack: Covid-19 response Hack Coach badge have leveraged their expertise and their skilling skills to successfully coach participants through the COVID-19 Response hackathon. They have created, tested and validated each challenge scenario. They have explained these challenges to customers, facilitated teamwork, collaboration and unblocking any technical questions.
844bba8c-f5d0-41ac-b67a-21d0f0f96859.name: What the Hack: COVID-19 Response Coach

badge_template_activities.title: Must be part of the What the Hack program.
Coach at the What the Hack: COVID-19 Response.

98818cf8-b524-48e5-9bbb-608af70bb01c.description: Earners of the Azure Social Justice Hackathon participated in the virtual event, submitted an eligible web or mobile application project that uses Azure to address an issue in social justice, and was selected as one of the winners by a panel of judges.
98818cf8-b524-48e5-9bbb-608af70bb01c.name: Azure Social Justice Hackathon

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a participant of the Azure Social Justice Hackathon.
Build an application prototype with Azure that helps empower communities and create change around one or more social justice issues.
Selected as one of the winning projects by the judges, placing 1st, 2nd, 3rd place, or Honorable Mention.

7ca0879e-0d29-4375-a1cf-118aca285714.description: Professional & technical acumen in driving conversations with internal Microsoft employees, partners, and customers on Azure networking and secure network architecture. Regional champions are on a continual path of learning Azure networking and network security working with Azure’s GBB team & communities. These regional champs have supported communities in network architecture & security guidance, created collateral that is publicly available &/or worked with product group on gaps
7ca0879e-0d29-4375-a1cf-118aca285714.name: Azure Advanced Networking & Security Regional Network Champion Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: · Must have completed MSLearning Azure Networking Learning Path OR Azure Networking Certification (AZ700)
· Must have demonstrated end to end network architecture experience with an enterprise customer
· Must actively participate in Azure Networking Communities either internally or publicly
· Must be willing to commit time each week to supporting the learning of others within your community on Azure Networking

5371afd5-7b6b-4348-83b7-dce6b28a6220.description: Earners of the Azure Developer Influencer badge have demonstrated the required skills to develop enterprise applications on the Azure platform and a willingness to share their knowledge with their community. They have been recognized by Microsoft as valuable contributors to their organization and have been nominated by a Microsoft Cloud Solution Architect and approved by the Microsoft North America Azure Team.
5371afd5-7b6b-4348-83b7-dce6b28a6220.name: Microsoft Azure Developer Influencer

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Identified as active influencers in their organization by sharing knowledge, being recognized for their accomplishments, and staying current on developer technologies and Azure services.
Nominated by a Microsoft Cloud Solution Architect.
Must demonstrate technical skills to design and build enterprise cloud solutions on the Azure platform.

ffaf428f-f933-4a3d-80a4-6413af4e3d1a.description: Earners of the AIOps Fundamentals Cloud Skills Challenge badge have demonstrated foundational knowledge of AI Operations with data analysis in Azure Data Explorer with Kusto Query Language, and an introduction to Power BI.
ffaf428f-f933-4a3d-80a4-6413af4e3d1a.name: AIOps Fundamentals Challenge Completion Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a participant in the AIOps Cloud Skills Challenge
Must complete all Microsoft Learn modules as part of the AIOps Fundamentals learning path

7ab8bdee-527e-4df2-8540-9fc90dcc02b6.description: Earners of the GitHub Advanced Security have demonstrated an understanding of the application security landscape and are able to articulate GitHub's place in it.
7ab8bdee-527e-4df2-8540-9fc90dcc02b6.name: GitHub Advanced Security Bootcamp

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft North America Azure Team
